summary:
With over 12 years of experience and a diverse background in both the corporate business world and the start-up arena, I bring a unique blend of expertise in leadership, project management, business development, and marketing to the table. 

With a proven track record in fast-moving consumer goods, I have a deep understanding of B2B growth strategies, and the ability to effectively manage diverse teams and complex challenges with a proactive, results-driven approach. My experience in founding and leading startups has advanced my skills in turning an idea into a value-adding product, driving innovation, making strategic decisions, and delivering exceptional results in a fast-paced and ever-changing environment. 

I can provide a visionary and challenging perspective to drive growth for your organization. I would be honored to connect and explore taking our business to the next level.

awards.title: In-store Excellence Award
awards.description: Achieved the highest in-store execution score in the supermarket channel and was granted the “In-store Excellence Award” in 2013

awards.title: Global Best Practice Projects Award
awards.description:
Honored to receive the Global Best Practice Projects Award by Coca-Cola in 2011
The HORECA volume driver project is selected as one of the top 3 global best practice projects.

awards.title: Dean's Honor Roll
awards.description:
Honored to be listed in Dean’s Honor Roll due to academic excellence for 2 consecutive years - 2007 and 2008

Dean’s Honor Roll: Each semester (Fall and Spring), students who have taken the normal load of courses including block courses*, and graded transfer credits in the respective semester, are eligible to be listed in the Dean’s Honor Roll if their semester grade point average is equal to or above 3.0. The University Executive Council evaluates the student’s eligibility for Dean’s Honor Roll.

awards.title: Dean's Honor Roll
awards.description:
Honored to be listed in Dean’s Honor Roll due to academic excellence for 2 consecutive years - 2007 and 2008

Dean’s Honor Roll: Each semester (Fall and Spring), students who have taken the normal load of courses including block courses*, and graded transfer credits in the respective semester, are eligible to be listed in the Dean’s Honor Roll if their semester grade point average is equal to or above 3.0. The University Executive Council evaluates the student’s eligibility for Dean’s Honor Roll.

awards.title: Vehbi Koç Scholars Award
awards.description:
Honored to receive Vehbi Koç Scholars Award due to academic excellence for 4 consecutive years - 2005, 2006, 2007 and 2008

Vehbi Koç Scholars Award: Each semester (Fall and Spring), students who have taken the normal load of courses including block courses, and graded transfer credits in the respective semester, are eligible to become Vehbi Koç Scholars Award if their semester grade point average is equal to or above 3.5. The University Executive Council evaluates the student’s eligibility for Vehbi Koç Scholarship.

awards.title: Double Major Program
awards.description: Accepted to the Double Major Program. Exclusively given the chance to graduate both in International Relations and Business Administration & Management in 4 years.

awards.title: Koç University Scholarship
awards.description: Granted %75 scholarship by Koç University from 2000 to 2004

projects.title: Juitox
projects.description:
I worked at Juitox, which is a startup offering fresh cold press juice and other healthy food, as a Business Development Consultant.

• Steered business development as a project-based consultancy
• Determined marketing strategies and executed marketing activations
• Planned sales strategies and developed sales channels
• Prepared long-term financial plans and kept monthly budgets
• Managed 3rd parties to establish an e-commerce website and implemented online marketing strategies

profile_positions.description:
Saleasy is an e-commerce enabler that allows brands to start selling at Europe’s leading e-commerce marketplaces by providing end-to-end e-commerce solutions. It manages services like market entry preparation, listing, operations, marketing, shipment and delivery, fulfillment, and customer services for online retailers.

• As the co-founder, successfully raised investment that actualized company value to €1.3 million
• Lead the conceptual phase of a project in close cooperation with the business stakeholders in order to deliver solutions aligned with the business strategy
• Led a multidisciplinary team of 8 talents in sales, marketing, finance, and IT to drive the project, in line with the business plan
• Generated leads and grew the business with merchants
• Co-developed online marketplace integrator SaaS (Software as a Service; Helix) with the IT team
profile_positions.title: Business Director

profile_positions.description:
iyzico is the leading payment service provider in Turkey that enables merchants to receive payments. It serves 17.000 key accounts with a $6.5 billion yearly volume and become a future unicorn nominee in 2017.

• Executed growth plans for iyzico’s b2b business in the global market
• Maximized revenue and managed relationships with strategic partners and PSPs (Adyen, Worldpay, ACI)
• Managed all commercial activities including pricing and contract alignments with key accounts from diverse industries to develop partnerships and grow revenue
• Established alignment with a sponsor, agrees with the management of key partners, and aligns core team and external parties to deliver the final project objectives 
• Represented iyzico at global summits to generate leads
profile_positions.title: International Business Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
REM People is a retail analytics company that provides AI-powered retail execution management solutions. It collects market data for the decision-making of retailers.

• Developed and led the implementation of b2b sales and marketing strategies
• Drove the business to grow with a limited marketing budget
• Maximized revenue by up-selling the current accounts, adding new merchants, and developing new sales channels
• Co-developed a new SaaS by transforming customers’ needs for effective decision-making in sales and marketing
• Led a team of territory sales managers and a marketing manager in different locations
profile_positions.title: Director of Sales and Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Kapgel is a technology startup offering on-time delivery services by connecting online and offline retailers with same-day couriers. Achieved $1.5 million investment; acquired by Turkey’s largest VC.

• Established and managed retailer and courier operations
• Designed initiatives to foster retailer and courier user experience on the marketplace during their • • • • Created operational efficiency by centralizing and optimizing delivery activities to shape the future of delivery operations
• Executed guerilla and stunt activations to increase brand awareness and drive word of mouth 
• Identified repeatable best practices from each region and implemented them for business expansion
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Operation Director

profile_positions.description:
Taxibeat (Currently Beat/FreeNow) is an innovative startup that transforms the taxi-hailing process into a direct marketplace between taxi drivers and passengers. Acquired by Daimler in 2017.

• provided operational and marketing consultancy for market entry
• collaborated with regional teams in the EU markets to expand the best practices in other markets
• executed groundwork about the supply (drivers) and demand (riders) of the business in order to understand transportation pinpoints and regulations
• set up a team of 6 to kickstart operations for the initial fleet-building process
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for all beverage categories in the grocery sales channel
• Created yearly sales and marketing business plans for a key account with 1400 stores
• Managed a diverse sales team of 3 sales developers & 8 sales representatives
• Achieved €6.3 million in annual sales with 16% profitability growth in 2013
• Collaborated with the marketing team to develop volume driver campaigns and tasting activations
• Implemented deep data analysis, generated insights, and identified opportunities
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for all beverage categories in the grocery sales channel
• Led a sales team of 5 sales representatives and 9 merchandise representatives
• Achieved €3.1 million in annual sales with 38% profitability growth in 2012
• Managed all commercial and in-store marketing activities for over 100 accounts
• Achieved the highest in-store execution score and granted “In-store Excellence Award”
profile_positions.title: Sales Developer

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for the sparkling beverages category in the grocery sales channel
• Implemented marketing business plans for the two leading key accounts (Migros and Carrefour)
• Led the implementation of innovative integrated marketing projects
• Organized marketing projects like tasting, stunt, and guerilla activations to create word of mouth
• Launched new product portfolio, and packages and leveraged them within the business unit
• Managed communication between parties to implement sustainable marketing activations
profile_positions.title: Assistant Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for the sparkling beverages category in the Horeca sales channel
• Created value propositions from opportunities and prepared integrated marketing business plans
• Developed a pioneering marketing project that targets to increase sales at highly price-sensitive segmented accounts (elected as one of the three most effective global best practice projects of the year)
• Implemented nationwide b2b loyalty program, packaging innovation project, and promotional campaigns
• Managed sponsorship deals with local football clubs, developed local football-themed strategies, organized meet & greet events with famous players
• Collaborated with internal (trade marketing, sales, supply chain, and finance) and external parties (creative, digital, PR, and event agencies) to develop long-term projects
profile_positions.title: Assistant Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for the sparkling beverages category in the Horeca sales channel
• Mined data and analytics to gain a better understanding of shopper behaviors
• Gathered critical insights from the sales teams and identified opportunities for the marketing teams 
• Designed BTL marketing campaigns and activations for sales channels and national key accounts (Domino's Pizza, Pizza Hut, and KFC) to capture growth opportunities
• Organized nationwide World Cup 2010 events and campaigns to increase brand love score
profile_positions.title: Marketing Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Gathered market insights and determine the opportunities to make recommendations to brand teams
• Contributed to the execution of the promotional plan
profile_positions.title: Marketing Trainee

profile_positions.description:
• Analyzed market research reports about durable white goods
• Cupported the execution of promotional campaigns for retailers
profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern

profile_positions.description:
• Worked at the dean of students office
• Supervised a group of undergraduates about social, personal and academic life to ease their transition period to university
profile_positions.title: Mentor
